name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-42a6c1319810f425e3f03fc81e6508efbdab2fdf "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
